package.name: mysqlnd_mariadb_auth
package.description: The mysqlnd_mariadb_auth extension provides an Ed25519-based authentication plugin for PHPâ€™s mysqlnd driver, allowing secure authentication with MariaDB servers using modern cryptography via libsodium. This improves connection security by replacing the SHA-1-based mysql_native_password authentication with Ed25519 public-key signatures. Support for additional authentication methods, including the MariaDB parsec plugin, is planned for future versions.
package.notes: Initial beta release of MariaDB authentication plugin for PHP.
